summary: Integration test suite that sets up a synthetic 3D medical imaging dataset, configures a UNet training pipeline with MONAI transforms and loss functions, runs a fast training loop, measures execution time, and validates that the training completes within expected performance bounds while cleaning up temporary resources.
business_intent: Verify that the accelerated training workflow for medical image segmentation delivers the required speed and resource efficiency, preventing performance regressions and ensuring reliable operation on GPU-enabled environments.
